import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { createPost } from '../actions/posts'; function QuoteForm({postForm, setPostForm}){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); //change the value of the postForm state and the input text box function inputTextHandler(e){ setPostForm({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } //post info to database function postInfo(e){ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createPost(postForm)); } return(

); } export default QuoteForm;
